definitions.definition: Expression of worry , failure , shock , etc., often at something seen for the first time or remembered immediately before using this term.
examples: Shit! I think that I forgot to pack my sleeping bag last night!

definitions.definition: Used to show displeasure or surprise .
examples: "Oh, shit . I left my worksheet at home," she said to the language arts teacher, which got her in trouble.

definitions.definition: Used for mere emphasis; heck , hey .

main_definition: ( slang , mildly vulgar ) Expression of worry , failure , shock , etc., often at something seen for the first time or remembered immediately before using this term.
secondary_definitions: ( vulgar ) Used to show displeasure or surprise .
( vulgar ) Used for mere emphasis; heck , hey .
